mapper.select: SELECT b_num, b_name, b_title, to_char(b_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as b_date FROM spring_board ORDER BY b_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into spring_board(b_num, b_name, b_title, b_content, b_pwd) values(spring_board_seq.nextval, #{b_name}, #{b_title}, #{b_content}, #{b_pwd})
mapper.update: UPDATE spring_board SET readcnt = readcnt + 1 WHERE b_num= #{num}
